source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Acrylic ABSTRACT with a Painting Knife. Part 1

visible_instructors.title: Gerald Ashcroft
visible_instructors.name: Gerald
visible_instructors.job_title: Landscape and Abstract Artist and Teacher

items.headline: Paint this dynamic Abstract with only 2 Primary Colours and White - pieces of Cotton Rag and a Painting Knife
objectives_summary: Paint a dynamic Abstract with only 2 Primary Colours and White
Do a Colour Mixing exercise first to prepare you for the featured Abstract
How to layout and organize the Colours on your Palette

items.title: MIG Welding Part 1

visible_instructors.title: Desiree Rohrer
visible_instructors.name: Desiree
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO of Hangar44, the very first Garage Studio in Europe

items.headline: The technique of metal inert gas welding for beginners and advanced.
objectives_summary: In the course MIG and MAG welding part 1 you can learn about inert gas welding using practical examples

items.title: Watercolour painting for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Anne Edwards
visible_instructors.name: Anne
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artst - MA Royal College of Art London

items.headline: A step by step guide on how to use Watercolours and make your first painting
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to paint a watercolour with confidence and skill
In this course you will be advised regarding the materials you will need to make a watercolour painting
In this course you will be introduced to Colour theory and shown how to use and apply watercolour paint

items.title: Essential guide to survival in the wilderness advanced
items.headline: Wilderness survival and living skills for long term survival.
objectives_summary: This course will allow much greater ease in the wilderness and longer term survival skills.

items.title: Polymer Doll Making, Craft and Sculpting Character Art Doll.

visible_instructors.title: Pornwan Wongpakdee
visible_instructors.name: Pornwan
visible_instructors.job_title: how to make a cute doll with polymer clay

items.headline: Learn How to Make Polymer Dolls, Sculpt and DIY Handmade Dolls with Polymer Clay, Custom Dolls. Handicraft for Gift
objectives_summary: Learn the basics and principles of making dolls with polymer clay
The whole process of how to create a doll step by step from start to finish, that's easy for anyone to do it.
Know the technique how to make beautiful doll

items.title: Fusion Style Floral Design Master Course
items.headline: Taught by the Floral Design Champion-Mark Pampling
objectives_summary: Advanced Floral Design Theory and Techniques
"Fusion Style" Structural Floral Design
Floral Design Inspiration

items.title: Digital Art : Painting Realistic Hair
items.headline: from simple sketch to finished painting
objectives_summary: You'll be able to paint realistic hair in Photoshop CC

items.title: Watercolor Painting for Children with Cynthia Parsons

visible_instructors.title: Brainy Pixel Productions
visible_instructors.name: Brainy Pixel
visible_instructors.job_title: Creativity Instructors, Traditional Arts, Digital Arts, Tech

items.headline: Kids watercolor course - color theory and painting techniques for children - Cynthia Massey Parsons
objectives_summary: Create your own watercolor essentials guidebook by following along with the lessons to create the pages to build your own personal reference guide of the skills and knowledge you have gained.
Learn about and thoroughly understand primary and complementry colors and how to use them.
Thoroughly understand the various materials needed for watercoloring; their similarities; their differences; and when you should use one as oppossed to another.

items.title: Watercolor and Pastel Techniques for Light Filled Paintings
items.headline: Capture Light and Vibrancy with Watercolor and Pastels
objectives_summary: How to start and complete basic watercolor paintings.
Essential watercolor painting techniques.
What are pastels and how to use them.

items.title: Composition Basics for Abstract or Realistic Beginners
items.headline: Tips you can put into practice right now for your abstracts or realistic paintings
objectives_summary: Be able to identify different compositions
Be able to choose different compositions or their work
Be able to try different compositions to see it suits their work

items.title: How to Draw 1920s Cartoon Animals for People Who Can't Draw!
items.headline: Learn to Draw Old School, Vintage Style, Cartoon Animal Faces Using Simple Shapes!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will have created a whole bunch stylish 1920s cartoon critters for you to share with the world!

items.title: How to Draw the Skull - Figure Drawing Anatomy Course
items.headline: Drawing for Beginners Face I Head - The Easy Way
objectives_summary: How to Draw
How to Draw a Skull
How to Draw a Head

items.title: Flowers With Watercolors: Paint Your Own Awesome Florals

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Master Wet-In-Wet As Well As Other Fast & Loose Techniques
objectives_summary: Master wet-in-wet techniques.

items.title: Digital Anime Coloring for Beginners
items.headline: For absolute beginners, learn how to start doing digital art from scratch!
objectives_summary: Steps of creating a fully-colored digital anime artwork
Understanding canvas size & resolution
Understanding digital coloring tools & layers

items.title: Painting With Acrylics - COPYING A PHOTO -Step by Step
items.headline: Fun and easy course on painting with acrylic paint, covering supplies, colour theory, and painting techniques.
objectives_summary: Paint something realistically, from a photo
Learn colour theory
Learn mixing paints

items.title: Pen & Ink Illustration: The Basics for Creating Magical Art
items.headline: How to use pen & ink in your drawings. Basic & advanced techniques, but perfect for beginners!
objectives_summary: What Supplies to Get
How Different Tools Act
Line Variation and Why it's Important
